title: Sri Lanka to receive more medical supplies and drugs from India
body_lines: More than 25 tons of medicinal drugs and medical supplies worth over LKR 200 million donated by India is expected to reach Sri Lanka on Friday (May 27).
Meanwhile, a large consignment of humanitarian assistance of over LKR 2 billion from India reached Colombo on Sunday (May 22).
The consignment had been flagged off from Chennai by the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu M.K. Stalin on the 18th of May.
